00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenObject.h"
00009 #include "errors.h"
00010 #include "objects.h"
00011 
00012 using namespace std;
00013 
00014 void extendObject(MavenCompiler* c, MavenObject* o, string extendClass) {
00015         if(o->extends == "")
00016                 o->extends = extendClass;
00017         else o->extends += "," + extendClass;
00018                 
00019         int namespaceID = -1, objectID = -1;
00020         findClass(c, extendClass, namespaceID, objectID);
00021         
00022         // class must be found
00023         smartAssert(namespaceID >= 0);
00024         smartAssert(objectID >= 0);
00025         
00026         // abstract classes can only extend other abstract classes
00027         if(o->isAbstract && !c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->isAbstract &&
00028            c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->name != "Object") {
00029                 pushError(c, "Abstract class '%s' can not inherit from non-abstract '%s'", o->name,
00030                                   c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->name);
00031                 return;
00032         }
00033         
00034         // methods
00035         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->length(); ++i) {
00036                 // skip special Object methods
00037                 if(c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).name == "copy" &&
00038                    c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i).args.length() == 0)
00039                         continue;
00040                         
00041                 MavenFunction f = c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->functions->at(i);
00042                 f.isInherited = true;
00043                 o->functions->push(f);
00044         }
00045         
00046         // variables
00047         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->variables->length(); ++i) {
00048                 MavenVariable v = c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->variables->at(i);
00049                 v.isInherited = true;
00050                 o->variables->push(v);
00051         }
00052 }
